目前本页对应的原文历史是''' 23:45, 14 June 2016‎ （3,691字节） '''版本，请注意更新正文内容及本时间戳。}} {{TNT|Expand}} {{TNT|MWReleases}} '''MediaWiki 1.27''' is a future release. Consult the {{git file|project=mediawiki/core|branch=REL1_27|file=RELEASE-NOTES-1.27|text=RELEASE-NOTES}} file for the full list of changes. It is currently deployed on Wikimedia Foundation wikis through incremental "1.27.0-wmf.''NN''" branches starting 29 September 2015 ([[Special:PrefixIndex/{{FULLPAGENAME}}/wmf|see details of each]]). The 1.27.0 stable release is expected to come out on June 28th 2016https://lists.wikimedia.org/pipermail/mediawiki-announce/2016-June/000190.html, and will be a Long Term Support release (LTS) which will be supported for three years. Download the {{mwsnapshots-link|latest snapshot|branch=REL1_27}} or checkout the {{git file|project=mediawiki/core|branch=REL1_27|action=log|text=REL1_27}} branch [[Special:MyLanguage/Download from Git|in Git]] to follow this release. == 新功能 == === InstantCommons made easier and cheaper === {{ll|InstantCommons}} will now truly work out of the box, as long as your users can connect to upload.wikimedia.org: thumbnails will be served from that domain instead of requiring local generation ([[gerrit:251556]]). === More documentation translation === Works continues on the [[Project:Language policy|migration to the Translate extension]], now used by about 3000 pages. The size of translations text increased by various megabytes. Thanks go to our tireless translation administrators and translators but also to [[Google Code-in 2015]] students, in particular [[User:IoannisKydonis|IoannisKydonis]] who migrated thousands of translations including the entire [[Manual:FAQ]]. == Upgrade notices for MediaWiki administrators == === Breaking changes === * MediaWiki now requires at least PHP 5.5.9. This corresponds with HHVM 3.1.{{Gerrit|266931}} * If the openssl and mcrypt PHP extensions are both unavailable, secure session storage (used for login) will raise an exception. This exception may be bypassed by setting $wgSessionInsecureSecrets = true;. * The [[Extension:RandomRootPage|RandomRootPage extension]] has been [[phab:T109809|merged]] into MediaWiki core. If you have it installed, you should uninstall it. * The [[Extension:ApiSandbox|ApiSandbox extension]] has been [[phab:T89386|merged]] into MediaWiki core. If you have it installed, you should uninstall it. * [[mailarchive:wikitech-l/2016-May/085725.html|AuthManager]]. If you're writing a new extension, you should definitely follow [[Manual:SessionManager and AuthManager]] and then upgrade to 1.27 to use it. If you are making sure an existing extension is compatible with 1.27, see the [[mw:Manual:SessionManager_and_AuthManager/Updating_tips|updating tips]]. {{clear}} {{TNT|MediaWiki Release navigation|1.27}} == Release schedule == The anticipated dates for point releases for 1.27 are as follows: {| class="wikitable" !
